title: Research
text: My graduate research focuses on questions related to how listeners use socio-indexical information for the weighting of varying phonetic cues in the process of speech perception. I have recently completed a speech perception experiment at UC Davis that will serve as basis of my qualifying paper for PhD candidacy in Linguistics.

title: About
text: I am a graduate student in the Department of Linguistics at UC Davis. I have over 12 years of language teaching experience both in the U.S. and abroad in Japan.
